sentences.en: Avant - garde of art derives from the treachery against established model.
sentences.cn: 艺术的 前卫,源于对既定模型的叛逃.

sentences.en: Avant - garde organizations are using several tools to assess the satisfaction level of employees.
sentences.cn: Avant - garde组织正在使用一些工具来评估员工的满意度层次.

sentences.en: Et est - ce qu'on se vide le coeur avant de finir?
sentences.cn: 演出快将结束的时候,大家是不是有点失望的感觉 呢 ?

sentences.en: Fran? ois : Pas avant midi ? Mais il me faut mardi!
sentences.cn: 中午前不行 吗? 可我周三就要呀!

sentences.en: He was an enthusiast for the avant-garde.
sentences.cn: 他是个先锋艺术的狂热拥护者。

sentences.en: In avant - garde New York everybody knew money.
sentences.cn: 在先锋派的纽约,人人都精于生财之道.

sentences.en: In essence, resistance of avant garde art is just a game.
sentences.cn: 先锋艺术的反抗实质上只是一种游戏。

sentences.en: In my works, I've been trying to realize avant - guard architectural forms.
sentences.cn: 我后来做作品一直是如何在建筑里搞前卫建筑.

sentences.en: In Paris he made friends among the avant-garde.
sentences.cn: 他在巴黎结交先锋人士。

sentences.en: N'entrez pas dans la pi è ce avant que l'enfant ne se r é veille.
sentences.cn: 在孩子醒来之前,请你们不要进屋子.

sentences.en: Nothing, though, should take away from this phenomenal work of outsider art, a neo-avant-garde exercise in bodyshock violence that features an unknown cast and dialogue in Latin and Aramaic.
sentences.cn: 虽然，没什么能从这部非凡的化外艺术作品中拿走？ ，一次新先锋派在身体暴力上的练习，由一组不知名演员出演，以拉丁语和阿拉米语进行对话。

sentences.en: Struggling avant - garde artists are having to look elsewhere for cheap digs.
sentences.cn: 苦苦挣扎的 前卫 艺术家必须另寻便宜的工作室了.

sentences.en: The avant - couriers have already started, and the majority will follow soon.
sentences.cn: 先锋队已经出发了, 大部队随后也将出发.

sentences.en: The avant - garde habitat of the famous actress sold for millions.
sentences.cn: 那个名演员的先锋派住宅卖出了几百万英镑的好价钱.

sentences.en: The avant - garde home of the famous actre sold for millio.
sentences.cn: 那个名演员的先锋派住宅卖出了几百万美元的好价钱.

sentences.en: The first Dada performances were put on by a group of avant-garde poets, writers and performances artists at Cabaret Voltaire.
sentences.cn: 第一个达达表演是由一群先锋派诗人、作家和表演艺术家们在伏尔泰夜总会上演的。

sentences.en: Where the show really excites is in the display of avant-garde photography.
sentences.cn: 那场展览真正令人激动的就是先锋派摄影的展示。
